fullText: Directed by Kenny Leon, the beauty of the Black vernacular is embedded in the “Purlie Victorious” script. Specificities of Black American life are infused within the jokes as Odom and the cast deftly switch from comedy to drama on a dime.

keyPhrases.quote: the beauty of the Black vernacular is embedded in the 'Purlie Victorious' script
Odom and the cast deftly switch from comedy to drama on a dime
